debates.showAs: Sanctions against the State of Israel Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to prevent and address the commission of the international crimes of genocide and apartheid by the State of Israel, by providing for the establishment of economic sanctions.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do chur cosc le Stát Iosrael, agus do thabhairt aghaidh ar Stát Iosrael, do dhéanamh na gcoireanna idirnáisiúnta arb éard iad cinedhíothú agus cinedheighilt, trí shocrú a dhéanamh chun smachtbhannaí eacnamaíocha a bhunú.
bill.shortTitleEn: Sanctions against the State of Israel Bill 2025
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Smachtbhannaí i gcoinne Stát Iosrael, 2025

debates.showAs: Emergency Inspection of Dublin Zoo Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to require the Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage to produce a report on the appointment of an emergency independent inspector for Dublin Zoo.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht dá cheangal ar an Aire Tithíochta, Rialtais Áitiúil agus Oidhreachta tuarascáil a chur ar fáil maidir le cigire neamhspleách éigeandála a cheapadh le haghaidh Zú Bhaile Átha Cliath.
bill.shortTitleEn: Emergency Inspection of Dublin Zoo Bill 2025
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Iniúchadh Éigeandála ar Zú Bhaile Átha Cliath, 2025

debates.showAs: Animal Health and Welfare (Welfare of Pigs) Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Animal Health and Welfare Act 2013 to improve the welfare of pigs by prohibiting teeth-clipping, tail-docking and castration, limiting the use of tusk reduction and regulating sow stalls and farrowing crates.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Shláinte agus Leas Ainmhithe, 2013 chun leas muc a fheabhsú trí thoirmeasc a chur le bearradh fiacla, sciotadh eireaball agus coilleadh, tríd an úsáid a bhaintear as laghdú starrfhiacla a theorannú agus trí stallaí cránacha agus cliathbhoscaí cráinbhreithe a rialáil.
bill.shortTitleEn: Animal Health and Welfare (Welfare of Pigs) Bill 2025
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Shláinte agus Leas Ainmhithe (Leas Muc), 2025

debates.showAs: Disregard of Historic Offences for Consensual Sexual Activity Between Men Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to make provision for a process for the disregard of certain historic criminal convictions arising from consensual sexual activity between men; to amend the Irish Human Rights and Equality Commission Act 2014; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le próiseas chun neamhaird a thabhairt ar chiontuithe coiriúla stairiúla áirithe a d’eascair as gníomhaíocht ghnéasach chomhthoiliúil idir fir; do leasú an Achta fá Choimisiún na hÉireann um Chearta an Duine agus Comhionannas, 2014; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Disregard of Historic Offences for Consensual Sexual Activity Between Men Bill 2025
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Neamhaird a Thabhairt ar Chionta Stairiúla i dtaobh Gníomhaíocht Ghnéasach Chomhthoiliúil Idir Fir, 2025

debates.showAs: Animal Health and Welfare (Ban on Fox Hunting) Bill 2025: Second Stage [Private Members]
Animal Health and Welfare (Ban on Fox Hunting) Bill 2025: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Animal Health and Welfare (Ban on Fox Hunting) Bill 2025: First Stage (Resumed)
Animal Health and Welfare (Ban on Fox Hunting) Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Animal Health and Welfare Act 2013 to ban the hunting of a fox or foxes; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Shláinte agus Leas Ainmhithe, 2013 chun cosc a chur ar shionnach nó ar shionnaigh a fhiach; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Animal Health and Welfare (Ban on Fox Hunting) Bill 2025
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Shláinte agus Leas Ainmhithe (Cosc ar Shionnaigh a Fhiach), 2025

debates.showAs: Planning and Development (Exempted Development – External Wall Insulation) Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Planning and Development Act 2000 to exempt external wall insulation from planning permission, with the exception of certain limited circumstances.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Pleanáil agus Forbairt, 2000 chun insliú ballaí seachtracha a dhíolmhú ó chead pleanála, seachas in imthosca teoranta áirithe.
bill.shortTitleEn: Planning And Development (Exempted Development - External Wall Insulation) Bill 2025
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Pleanáil agus Forbairt (Forbairt Dhíolmhaithe - Insliú Ballaí Seachtracha), 2025

debates.showAs: Criminal Law (Prohibition of the Disclosure of Counselling Records) Bill 2025: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Criminal Law (Prohibition of the Disclosure of Counselling Records) Bill 2025: Second Stage [Private Members]
Criminal Law (Prohibition of the Disclosure of Counselling Records) Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Criminal Evidence Act 1992 in the interests of balancing the right to privacy, the right to healthcare and the functioning of the criminal justice system, to prohibit the disclosure of counselling records in criminal proceedings in criminal trials for sexual offences; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Fhianaise Choiriúil, 1992 ar mhaithe le cothromaíocht a dhéanamh ar an gceart chun príobháideachta, an ceart chun cúraim sláinte agus feidhmiú an chórais ceartais choiriúil, chun nochtadh taifead comhairliúcháin a thoirmeasc in imeachtaí coiriúla i dtrialacha coiriúla i leith cionta gnéasacha; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Criminal Law (Prohibition of the Disclosure of Counselling Records) Bill 2025
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um an Dlí Coiriúil (Nochtadh Taifead Comhairliúcháin a Thoirmeasc), 2025

debates.showAs: Building Energy Rating (BER) Standards for Private Rented Accommodation Bill 2025: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Building Energy Rating (BER) Standards for Private Rented Accommodation Bill 2025: Second Stage [Private Members]
Building Energy Rating (BER) Standards for Private Rented Accommodation Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Housing (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 1992 to provide for minimum Building Energy Rating (BER) standards for private rented accommodation and for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú Acht na dTithe (Forálacha Ilghnéitheacha), 1992 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le caighdeáin íosta i leith Rátáil Fuinnimh Foirgnimh (RFF) le haghaidh cóiríocht phríobháideach ar cíos agus maidir le nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Building Energy Rating (BER) Standards for Private Rented Accommodation Bill 2025
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chaighdeáin i leith Rátáil Fuinnimh Foirgnimh (RFF) le haghaidh Cóiríocht Phríobháideach ar Cíos, 2025

debates.showAs: Protection of Tenants' Deposits Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Residential Tenancies (Amendment) Act 2015 so that the provisions in that Act for tenant deposits to be sent to the Residential Tenancies Board are commenced within 90 days of the passing of this Act.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe (Leasú), 2015 ionas go mbeidh tosach feidhme, laistigh de 90 lá ón Acht seo a rith, leis na forálacha san Acht sin a fhorálann go ndéanfar éarlaisí tionóntaí a chur chuig an mBord um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe.
bill.shortTitleEn: Protection of Tenants' Deposits Bill 2025
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Éarlaisí Tionóntaí a Chosaint, 2025

debates.showAs: Animal Sentience Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: An Act to amend the Animal Health and Welfare Act 2013 to make provision for an Animal Sentience Committee with functions relating to the effect of government policy on the welfare of animals as sentient beings.
bill.longTitleGa: Acht do leasú an Achta um Shláinte agus Leas Ainmhithe, 2013 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le Coiste um Mothaitheacht Ainmhithe ag a mbeidh feidhmeanna i ndáil le héifeacht bheartas an Rialtais ar leas ainmhithe mar neacha mothaitheacha.
bill.shortTitleEn: Animal Sentience Bill 2024
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Mothaitheacht Ainmhithe, 2024

debates.showAs: Animal Health and Welfare (Prohibition of Animal Testing for Botox) (Amendment) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Animal Health and Welfare Act 2013 to prohibit animal testing for botox.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Shláinte agus Leas Ainmhithe, 2013 chun tástáil Botox ar ainmhithe a thoirmeasc.
bill.shortTitleEn: Animal Health and Welfare (Prohibition of Animal Testing for Botox) (Amendment) Bill 2024
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Shláinte agus Leas Ainmhithe (Tástáil Botox ar Ainmhithe a Thoirmeasc) (Leasú), 2024

debates.showAs: Emergency Price Controls Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to introduce emergency price controls for petrol, diesel, electricity, natural gas and home heating oil.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do thabhairt isteach rialuithe éigeandála ar phraghsanna i leith peitril, díosail, leictreachais, gás nádúrtha agus ola téite baile.
bill.shortTitleEn: Emergency Price Controls Bill 2024
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Rialuithe Éigeandála ar Phraghsanna, 2024

debates.showAs: Grocery Price Caps Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to establish a Grocery Price Caps Commission to set maximum prices for basic foodstuffs and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do bhunú Coimisiúin um Praghasteorainneacha Uasta Grósaeireachta chun praghsanna uasta a shocrú le haghaidh bunearraí bia agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Grocery Price Caps Bill 2024
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Praghasteorainneacha Uasta Grósaeireachta, 2024

debates.showAs: Prohibition of Fossil Fuel Advertising Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to ban advertising of fossil fuels and fossil fuelled vehicles, including commercial sponsorship, by corporate entities and to establish a Fossil Fuel Information Commission for the purposes of product and price comparisons by the public.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do chur chosc le heintitis chorparáideacha d’fhógairt breoslaí iontaise agus feithiclí a bhreoslaítear le breoslaí iontaise, lena n-áirítear urraíocht tráchtála, agus do bhunú Coimisiún um Fhaisnéis faoi Bhreoslaí Iontaise chun gur féidir leis an bpobal comparáid a dhéanamh idir táirgí agus praghsanna.
bill.shortTitleEn: Prohibition of Fossil Fuel Advertising Bill 2024
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thoirmeasc ar Fhógraíocht Breoslaí Iontaise, 2024

debates.showAs: Mortgage Interest Rates Cap Bill 2023: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Mortgage Interest Rates Cap Bill 2023: Second Stage [Private Members]
Mortgage Interest Rates Cap Bill 2023: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to direct the Central Bank to cap interest rates on private dwelling house mortgages at 3 per cent; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do threorú don Bhanc Ceannais uasteorainn 3 faoin gcéad a chur le rátaí úis ar mhorgáistí a bhaineann le tithe cónaithe príobháideacha; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Mortgage Interest Rates Cap Bill 2023
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Uasteorainn a Chur le Rátaí Úis Morgáiste, 2023

debates.showAs: Planning and Development (Climate Emergency Measures) (Amendment) Bill 2023: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Planning and Development Act 2000 in order to restrict certain developments in fossil fuels infrastructure and high energy usage data centres, to remove some developments from listing as strategic development infrastructure projects, to revise the procedure for making applications directly to An Bord Pleanála and to ensure that regard be given to the State’s climate targets and commitments and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Pleanáil agus Forbairt, 2000 d’fhonn forbairtí áirithe i mbonneagar breoslaí iontaise agus i lárionaid sonraí ardúsáide fuinnimh a shrianadh, do chur deireadh le roinnt forbairtí a bheith á liostú mar thionscadail bonneagair forbartha straitéisí, d’athchóiriú an nóis imeachta chun iarratais a dhéanamh go díreach chuig an mBord Pleanála agus dá chinntiú go dtabharfar aird ar spriocanna agus gealltanais an Stáit maidir leis an aeráid agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Planning and Development (Climate Emergency Measures) (Amendment) Bill 2023
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Pleanáil agus Forbairt (Bearta Éigeandála Aeráide) (Leasú), 2023

debates.showAs: Ban Private Jet Aircraft from Irish Airspace Bill 2023: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Irish Aviation Authority Act 1993 to ban the use of private jets in Irish airspace.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Údarás Eitlíochta na hÉireann, 1993 chun úsáid scairdeitleán príobháideach in aerspás na hÉireann a chosc.
bill.shortTitleEn: Ban Private Jet Aircraft from Irish Airspace Bill 2023
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chosc ar Scaird-Aerárthaí Príobháideacha in Aerspás na hÉireann, 2023

debates.showAs: Rent Reduction Bill 2023: Second Stage [Private Members]
Rent Reduction Bill 2023: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Rent Reduction Bill 2023: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Residential Tenancies Act 2004 to reduce rents to affordable levels by limiting them to a maximum of a quarter of monthly household incomes and to establish a National Rent Authority for this purpose.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe, 2004 chun cíosanna a laghdú go dtí leibhéil inacmhainne tríd an gceathrú cuid ar a mhéid d’ioncaim theaghlaigh mhíosúla a chur de theorainn leo agus do bhunú Údarás Náisiúnta Cíosa chun na críche sin.
bill.shortTitleEn: Rent Reduction Bill 2023
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Laghdú Cíosa, 2023

debates.showAs: Health (Regulation of Termination of Pregnancy) (Amendment) Bill 2023: Restoration to Order Paper
Health (Regulation of Termination of Pregnancy) (Amendment) Bill 2023: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Health (Regulation of Termination of Pregnancy) (Amendment) Bill 2023: Second Stage [Private Members]
Health (Regulation of Termination of Pregnancy) (Amendment) Bill 2023: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Health (Regulation of Termination of Pregnancy) Act 2018 to provide for abortion on request prior to foetal viability; to abolish the 3 day waiting period for abortion on request; to allow for abortion on grounds of fatal foetal abnormality that are likely to lead to the death of the foetus either before or within a year of birth; to allow for abortion where there is a risk to the life, or of serious harm to the health, of the pregnant woman; and to decriminalise the provision of abortion.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Sláinte (Foirceannadh Toirchis a Rialáil), 2018 chun foráil a dhéanamh maidir le ginmhilleadh ar é a iarraidh roimh inmharthanacht féatais; do chealú na tréimhse feithimh 3 lá le haghaidh ginmhilleadh ar é a iarraidh; do cheadú ginmhilleadh ar fhorais éalainge marfaí féatais ar dóigh gur trúig bháis don fhéatas í roimh an mbreith nó laistigh de bhliain tar éis na breithe; do cheadú ginmhilleadh i gcás go mbeidh baol ann do bheatha na mná toircheasaí nó baol díobhála tromchúisí do shláinte na mná toircheasaí; agus do dhíchoiriúlú sholáthar an ghinmhillte.
bill.shortTitleEn: Health (Regulation of Termination of Pregnancy) (Amendment) Bill 2023
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Sláinte (Foirceannadh Toirchis a Rialáil) (Leasú), 2023

debates.showAs: Health (Regulation of Termination of Pregnancy) (Amendment) Bill 2022: Leave to Withdraw [Private Members]
Health (Regulation of Termination of Pregnancy) (Amendment) Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Health (Regulation of Termination of Pregnancy) Act 2018 to provide for abortion on request prior to foetal viability; to abolish the 3 day waiting period for abortion on request; to allow for abortion on grounds of fatal foetal abnormality that are likely to lead to the death of the foetus either before or within a year of birth; to allow for abortion where there is a risk to the life, or of serious harm to the health, of the pregnant woman; and to decriminalise the provision of abortion.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Sláinte (Foirceannadh Toirchis a Rialáil), 2018 chun foráil a dhéanamh maidir le ginmhilleadh ar é a iarraidh roimh inmharthanacht féatais; do chealú na tréimhse feithimh 3 lá le haghaidh ginmhilleadh ar é a iarraidh; do cheadú ginmhilleadh ar fhorais éalainge marfaí féatais ar dóigh gur trúig bháis don fhéatas í roimh an mbreith nó laistigh de bhliain tar éis na breithe; do cheadú ginmhilleadh i gcás go mbeidh baol ann do bheatha na mná toircheasaí nó baol díobhála tromchúisí do shláinte na mná toircheasaí; agus do dhíchoiriúlú sholáthar an ghinmhillte.
bill.shortTitleEn: Health (Regulation of Termination of Pregnancy) (Amendment) Bill 2022
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Sláinte (Foirceannadh Toirchis a Rialáil) (Leasú), 2022

debates.showAs: Misuse of Drugs (Cannabis Regulation) Bill 2022: Second Stage [Private Members]
Misuse of Drugs (Cannabis Regulation) Bill 2022: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Misuse of Drugs (Cannabis Regulation) Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Misuse of Drugs Act 1977 to enable a person who is at least 18 years of age to have possession, for the person’s personal use, of either or both cannabis and cannabis resin that in each case does not exceed a specified amount and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Mí-Úsáid Drugaí, 1977 chun a chumasú do dhuine, atá 18 mbliana d’aois ar a laghad, cannabas nó roisín cannabais, nó cannabas agus roisín cannabais, nach mó a mhéid nó a méid i ngach cás ná méid sonraithe, a shealbhú le haghaidh úsáid phearsanta an duine,  agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Misuse of Drugs (Cannabis Regulation) Bill 2022
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Mí-Úsáid Drugaí (Rialáil Cannabais), 2022

debates.showAs: Eviction Ban Bill 2022: Second Stage [Private Members]
Eviction Ban Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Residential Tenancies Act 2004 to ban evictions for the duration of the current housing emergency.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe, 2004 chun cosc a chur le díshealbhuithe ar feadh ré na héigeandála tithíochta reatha.
bill.shortTitleEn: Eviction Ban Bill 2022
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chosc ar Dhíshealbhuithe, 2022

debates.showAs: Rent Reduction Bill 2022: Second Stage [Private Members]
Rent Reduction Bill 2022: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Rent Reduction Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Residential Tenancies Act 2004 to reduce rents to affordable levels by limiting them to a maximum of a quarter of monthly household incomes and to establish a National Rent Authority for this purpose.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe, 2004 chun cíosanna a laghdú go dtí leibhéil inacmhainne tríd an gceathrú cuid ar a mhéid d’ioncaim theaghlaigh mhíosúla a chur de theorainn leo agus do bhunú Údarás Náisiúnta Cíosa chun na críche sin.
bill.shortTitleEn: Rent Reduction Bill 2022
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Laghdú Cíosa, 2022

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Safety, Health and Welfare at Work Act 2005 to ensure employers provide employees with FFP-2 grade masks, or higher, where necessary during the Covid-19 pandemic, in particular to education workers and healthcare workers, and to provide for a review of this provision within 3 months of enactment.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Shábháilteacht, Sláinte agus Leas ag an Obair, 2005 chun a chinntiú go ndéanfaidh fostóirí maisc de ghrád FFP-2 nó níos airde, más gá, a sholáthar d’fhostaithe le linn phaindéim Covid-19, go háirithe d’oibrithe oideachais agus cúraim sláinte, agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir le hathbhreithniú ar an méid sin laistigh de 3 mhí tar éis an reachtaíocht seo a achtú.
bill.shortTitleEn: Personal Protective Equipment (Covid-19) Bill 2022
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Threalamh Cosanta Pearsanta (Covid-19), 2022

debates.showAs: Thirty-ninth Amendment of the Constitution (Neutrality) Bill 2022: Second Stage [Private Members]
An Bille um an Naoú Leasú is Tríocha ar an mBunreacht (Neodracht), 2022: An Chéad Chéim
Thirty-ninth Amendment of the Constitution (Neutrality) Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Constitution.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht chun an Bunreacht a leasú.
bill.shortTitleEn: Thirty-Ninth Amendment of the Constitution (Neutrality) Bill 2022
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um an Naoú Leasú is Tríocha ar an mBunreacht (Neodracht), 2022

debates.showAs: National Minimum Wage (Equal Pay for Young Workers) Bill 2022: Second Stage [Private Members]
National Minimum Wage (Equal Pay for Young Workers) Bill 2022: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
National Minimum Wage (Equal Pay for Young Workers) Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the National Minimum Wage Act 2000 to remove the lower minimum wage rates imposed on those employed between the ages of 16 and 20.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Pá Íosta Náisiúnta, 2000 chun deireadh a chur leis na híosrátaí pá níos ísle a fhorchuirtear orthu siúd atá fostaithe agus idir 16 bliana agus 20 bliain d’aois.
bill.shortTitleEn: National Minimum Wage (Equal Pay for Young Workers) Bill 2022
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Pá Íosta Náisiúnta (Pá Comhionann d’Oibrithe Óga), 2022

debates.showAs: Workplace Ventilation (Covid-19) Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Workplace Ventilation (Covid-19) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Safety, Health and Welfare at Work Act 2005 to provide for a definition of fresh air based on CO2 levels in the workplace as an emergency Covid-19 prevention measure; to provide for health and safety inspectors to take CO2 measurements and issue improvement or prohibition notices; to provide for employees to request inspections; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Shábháilteacht, Sláinte agus Leas ag an Obair, 2005 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le míniú a thabhairt ar aer úr, a bheidh bunaithe ar leibhéil CO2 san áit oibre, mar bheart éigeandála chun Covid-19 a chosc; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cigirí sláinte agus sábháilteachta do thógáil toisí CO2 agus d’eisiúint fógraí feabhsúcháin nó toirmisc; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le fostaithe d’iarraidh iniúchtaí; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Workplace Ventilation (Covid-19) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Aeráil san Áit Oibre (Covid-19), 2021

debates.showAs: Planning and Development (Climate Emergency Measures) (Amendment) Bill 2021: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Planning and Development (Climate Emergency Measures) (Amendment) Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Planning and Development (Climate Emergency Measures) (Amendment) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Planning and Development Act 2000 in order to restrict certain developments in fossil fuels infrastructure and high energy usage data centres, to remove some developments from listing as strategic development infrastructure projects, to revise the procedure for making applications directly to An Bord Pleanála and to ensure that regard be given to the State’s climate targets and commitments and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Pleanáil agus Forbairt, 2000 d’fhonn forbairtí áirithe i mbonneagar breoslaí iontaise agus i lárionaid sonraí ardúsáide fuinnimh a shrianadh, do chur deireadh le roinnt forbairtí a bheith á liostú mar thionscadail bonneagair forbartha straitéisí, d’athchóiriú an nóis imeachta chun iarratais a dhéanamh go díreach chuig an mBord Pleanála agus dá chinntiú go dtabharfar aird ar spriocanna agus gealltanais an Stáit maidir leis an aeráid agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Planning and Development (Climate Emergency Measures) (Amendment) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Pleanáil agus Forbairt (Bearta Éigeandála Aeráide) (Leasú), 2021

debates.showAs: Employment Permits (Miscellaneous Provisions) Bill 2021: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Employment Permits (Miscellaneous Provisions) Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Employment Permits (Miscellaneous Provisions) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the protection of certain foreign nationals in employment in the State and for that purpose to amend the Employment Permits Act 2003, the Employment Permits Act 2006, the Protection of Employees (Employers’ Insolvency) Act 1984 and the Employment Permits Regulations 2017 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cosaint a thabhairt do náisiúnaigh eachtracha áirithe atá i bhfostaíocht sa Stát agus, chun na críche sin, do leasú an Achta um Cheadanna Fostaíochta, 2003, an Achta um Cheadanna Fostaíochta, 2006, an Achta um Chosaint Fostaithe (Dócmhainneacht Fostóirí), 1984 agus na Rialachán um Cheadanna Fostaíochta, 2017 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Employment Permits (Miscellaneous Provisions) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Cheadanna Fostaíochta (Forálacha Ilghnéitheacha), 2021

debates.showAs: Industrial Relations (Provisions in Respect of Pension Entitlements of Retired Workers) Bill 2021: Referral to Select Committee [Private Members]
Industrial Relations (Provisions in Respect of Pension Entitlements of Retired Workers) Bill 2021: Referral to Select Committee [Private Members]
Industrial Relations (Provisions in Respect of Pension Entitlements of Retired Workers) Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Industrial Relations (Provisions in Respect of Pension Entitlements of Retired Workers) Bill 2021: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Industrial Relations (Provisions in Respect of Pension Entitlements of Retired Workers) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend and extend certain rights and protections of retired persons and certain representative associations in relation to industrial relations and trade disputes and for that purpose to amend the Trade Union Acts 1871 to 1990 and the Industrial Relations Acts 1946 to 2019, to make provision for enhanced representation of retired workers in relation to the administration of certain pension schemes, to amend the Pensions Act 1990 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú agus do leathnú cearta agus cosaintí áirithe de chuid daoine scortha agus de chuid comhlachais ionadaíocha áirithe i ndáil le caidreamh tionscail agus le haighnis cheirde agus, chun na críche sin, do leasú na nAchtanna Ceardchumann, 1871 go 1990 agus na nAchtanna Caidrimh Thionscail, 1946 go 2019, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le hionadaíocht fheabhsaithe d’oibrithe scortha i ndáil le riaradh scéimeanna pinsean áirithe, do leasú Acht na bPinsean, 1990 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Industrial Relations (Provisions in Respect of Pension Entitlements of Retired Workers) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Caidrimh Thionscail (Forálacha i leith Teidlíochtaí Pinsin Oibrithe Scortha), 2021

debates.showAs: Residential Tenancies (Extension of Eviction Ban) Bill 2020: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to extend the ban on evictions and rent increases and for that purpose to amend the Residential Tenancies Act 2004.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht d’fhadú an choisc ar dhíshealbhuithe agus ar arduithe cíosa agus, chun na críche sin, do leasú an Achta um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe, 2004.
bill.shortTitleEn: Residential Tenancies (Extension of Eviction Ban) Bill 2020
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe (An Cosc ar Dhíshealbhuithe a Fhadú), 2020

debates.showAs: Animal Health and Welfare (Ban on Hare Coursing) Bill 2020: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to prohibit the coursing of hares with dogs and for that purpose to amend the Wildlife Act 1976 and the Animal Health and Welfare Act 2013, to make consequential and other amendments to the Greyhound Industry Act 1958 and other Acts relating to such coursing and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do thoirmeasc giorriacha a chúrsáil le madraí agus, chun na críche sin, do leasú an Achta um Fhiadhúlra, 1976 agus an Achta um Shláinte agus Leas Ainmhithe, 2013, do dhéanamh leasuithe iarmhartacha agus leasuithe eile ar Acht Tionscail na gCon, 1958 agus ar Achtanna eile a bhaineann le cúrsáil den sórt sin agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Animal Health and Welfare (Ban on Hare Coursing) Bill 2020
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Shláinte agus Leas Ainmhithe (Cosc ar Chúrsáil Giorriacha), 2020

debates.showAs: Dying with Dignity Bill 2020: Second Stage (Resumed)
Dying with Dignity Bill 2020: Second Stage [Private Members]
Dying with Dignity Bill 2020: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to make provision for assistance in achieving a dignified and peaceful end of life to qualifying persons and related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cúnamh do dhaoine cáilitheacha chun deireadh saoil dínitiúil suaimhneach a bhaint amach agus i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Dying with Dignity Bill 2020
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Bás Dínitiúil, 2020

debates.showAs: Thirty-ninth Amendment of the Constitution (Right to Housing) Bill 2020: Second Stage [Private Members]
An Bille um an Naoú Leasú is Tríocha ar an mBunreacht (Ceart chun Tithíochta) 2020: An Chéad Chéim
Thirty-Ninth Amendment of the Constitution (Right to Housing) Bill 2020: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Constitution.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht chun an Bunreacht a leasú.
bill.shortTitleEn: Thirty-ninth Amendment of the Constitution (Right to Housing) Bill 2020
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um an Naoú Leasú is Tríocha ar an mBunreacht (Ceart chun Tithíochta), 2020

debates.showAs: Anti-Evictions Bill 2018: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Anti-Evictions Bill 2018: Referral to Select Committee [Private Members]
Anti-Evictions Bill 2018: Second Stage [Private Members]
Anti-Evictions Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Residential Tenancies Act 2004 to provide for the greater security of tenure by extending tenancy rights for those with a licence to reside in student specific accommodation; by the inclusion of receivers and lenders that have taken possession of properties in the definition of a landlord, by the extension of notice periods for termination of a new tenancies; by making all tenancies over two months Part 4 tenancies; by making Part 4 tenancies of indefinite duration; by removing sale of property as a ground for terminating a tenancy, by providing for compensation where a tenancy is terminated on the ground that the dwelling is required by the landlord or a relative of the landlord for their own occupation; by removing renovation and refurbishment as a ground for termination of a tenancy; and by the extension of notice periods for new rents and for the termination of tenancies.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe, 2004 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le ráthaíocht tionachta níos mó trí chearta tionóntachta a leathnú chucu siúd a bhfuil ceadúnas acu chun cónaí i gcóiríocht atá go sonrach do mhic léinn; trí ghlacadóirí agus iasachtóirí a mbeidh seilbh glactha acu ar mhaoine a áireamh sa mhíniú ar thiarna talún, trí thréimhsí fógra a fhadú i leith tionóntachtaí nua a fhoirceannadh; trí thionóntachtaí faoi Chuid 4 a dhéanamh de gach tionóntacht os cionn dhá mhí; trí thionóntachtaí ré éiginnte a dhéanamh de thionóntachtaí faoi Chuid 4; trí dheireadh a chur le díol maoine mar fhoras le tionóntacht a fhoirceannadh, trí shocrú a dhéanamh maidir le cúiteamh i gcás go ndéanfar tionóntacht a fhoirceannadh ar an bhforas go bhfuil an teaghais ag teastáil ón tiarna talún nó ó ghaol leis an tiarna talún lena háitiú acu féin; trí dheireadh a chur le hathchóiriú agus le hathfheistiú mar fhoras le tionóntacht a fhoirceannadh; agus trí thréimhsí fhógra a fhadú i leith cíosanna nua agus i leith tionóntachtaí a fhoirceannadh.
bill.shortTitleEn: Anti-Evictions Bill 2018
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille i gcoinne Díshealbhuithe, 2018

debates.showAs: Prohibition of Fur Farming Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to prohibit the keeping of animals solely or primarily for slaughter for the value of their fur and to make related amendments to the Animal Health and Welfare Act 2013.
bill.longTitleGa:
Bille dá ngairtear Acht do thoirmeasc ainmhithe a choimeád d'aon toisc nó 
go príomha lena marú le haghaidh luach a bhfionnaidh agus do dhéanamh 
leasuithe gaolmhara ar an Acht um Shláinte agus Leas Ainmhithe, 2013.
bill.shortTitleEn: Prohibition of Fur Farming Bill 2018
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Fheirmeoireacht Fionnaidh a Thoirmeasc, 2018

debates.showAs: Provision of Objective Sex Education Bill 2018: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Provision of Objective Sex Education Bill 2018: Referral to Select Committee [Private Members]
Provision of Objective Sex Education Bill 2018: Second Stage [Private Members]
Provision of Objective Sex Education Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to guarantee the right of students to receive factual and objective relationships and sexuality education without regard to the characteristic spirit of the school
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do ráthú ceart mac léinn chun oideachas caidreamh agus gnéasachta atá fíorasach agus oibiachtúil a fháil gan aird ar spiorad sainiúil na scoile
bill.shortTitleEn: Provision of Objective Sex Education Bill 2018
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Oideachas Gnéis Oibiachtúil a Sholáthar, 2018

debates.showAs: Prohibition of Bogus Self-Employment Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to disincentivise employers from entering into bogus contracts for services, to prohibit dismissals in order to induce workers to enter into contracts for services, to prohibit misrepresenting employment as a contract for services, to prohibit false inducements for contract for services, to provide for a right to redress for workers party to a bogus contract for services and for claims to be heard under the Workplace Relations Act 2015, to amend the Unfair Dismissals Act, 1977 and the Workplace Relations Act 2015 and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhídhreasú fostóirí chun conarthaí bréige le haghaidh seirbhísí a dhéanamh, do thoirmeasc dífhostú d'fhonn oibrithe a aslú chun conarthaí le haghaidh seirbhísí a dhéanamh, do thoirmeasc fostaíocht a mhífhaisnéisiú mar chonradh le haghaidh seirbhísí, do thoirmeasc aslaigh bhréagacha maidir le conradh le haghaidh seirbhísí, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le ceart chun sásaimh d'oibrithe is páirtithe i gconradh bréige le haghaidh seirbhísí agus chun go ndéanfar éilimh a éisteacht faoin Acht um Chaidreamh san Áit Oibre, 2015, do leasú an Achta um Dhífhostú Éagórach, 1977 agus an Achta um Chaidreamh san Áit Oibre, 2015 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleEn: Prohibition of Bogus Self-Employment Bill 2018
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thoirmeasc ar Fhéinfhostaíocht Bhréige, 2018

debates.showAs: Petroleum and Other Minerals Development (Amendment) (Climate Emergency Measures) Bill 2018: Referral to Select Committee
Petroleum and Other Minerals Development (Amendment) (Climate Emergency Measures) Bill 2018: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Petroleum and Other Minerals Development (Amendment) (Climate Emergency Measures) Bill 2018: Referral to Select Committee [Private Members]
Petroleum and Other Minerals Development (Amendment) (Climate Emergency Measures) Bill 2018: Second Stage [Private Members]
Petroleum and Other Minerals Development (Amendment) (Climate Emergency Measures) Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the amendment of the Petroleum and Other Minerals Development Act 1960, to ensure regard is had to national and global environmental considerations including the annual average global temperature, the monthly mean level of carbon dioxide in the atmosphere and other matters, when issuing licences, undertakings and leases under the Petroleum and Other Minerals Development Act 1960 and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir leis an Acht um Fhorbairt Pheitriliaim agus Mianraí Eile, 1960 a leasú chun a chinntiú go dtabharfar aird ar chúinsí comhshaoil náisiúnta agus domhanda, lena n-áirítear an mheánteocht dhomhanda bhliantúil, an meánleibhéal míosúil dé-ocsaíde carbóin san atmaisféar agus nithe eile, le linn ceadúnais, gealltanais agus léasanna a eisiúint faoin Acht um Fhorbairt Pheitriliaim agus Mianraí Eile, 1960 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleEn: Petroleum and Other Minerals Development (Amendment) (Climate Emergency Measures) Bill 2018
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Fhorbairt Peitriliam agus Mianraí Eile (Leasú) (Bearta Éigeandála Aeráide), 2018

debates.showAs: An Bille um an gCúigiú Leasú is Tríocha ar an mBunreacht (An Eaglais agus an Stát a Imdheighilt) 2017: An Chéad Chéim
Thirty-fifth Amendment of the Constitution (Separation of Church and State) Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Constitution
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht chun an Bunreacht a leasú
bill.shortTitleEn: Thirty-fifth Amendment of the Constitution (Separation of Church and State) Bill 2017
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um an gCúigiú Leasú is Tríocha ar an mBunreacht (An Eaglais agus an Stát a Imdheighilt), 2017

debates.showAs: Industrial Relations (Defence Forces) (Amendment) Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to permit access to the Workplace Relations Commission and Labour Court to members of the Defence Forces and their representative associations; to amend the definition of "worker" in the Industrial Relations Act 1990; to remove restrictions on representative associations associating with trade unions or members of the Defence Forces having trade union membership; and for these and other purposes to amend the Industrial Relations Act 1990 and the Defence (Amendment) Act 1990; and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do cheadú rochtain ar an gCoimisiún um Chaidreamh san Áit Oibre agus ar an gCúirt Oibreachais do chomhaltaí d'Óglaigh na hÉireann agus dá gcomhlachais ionadaíocha; do leasú an mhínithe ar "oibrí" san Acht Caidrimh Thionscail, 1990; do chur deireadh le srianta ar chomhlachais ionadaíocha comhlachas a dhéanamh le ceardchumainn nó ar chomhaltaí d'Óglaigh na hÉireann a bheith ina gcomhaltaí de cheardchumann; agus, chun na gcríoch sin agus chun críoch eile, do leasú an Achta Caidrimh Thionscail, 1990 agus an Achta Cosanta (Leasú), 1990; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleEn: Industrial Relations (Defence Forces) (Amendment) Bill 2017
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Caidrimh Thionscail (Óglaigh na hÉireann) (Leasú), 2017

debates.showAs: Planning and Development (Amendment) Bill 2017: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Planning and Development (Amendment) Bill 2017: Second Stage [Private Members]
Planning and Development (Amendment) Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Planning and Development Acts 2000 to 2016 to ensure that development with the object or effect of deterring homeless persons from obtaining shelter from a structure, land or building is not exempted development, and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú na nAchtanna um Pleanáil agus Forbairt, 2000 go 2016 chun a chinntiú nach forbairt dhíolmhaithe forbairt arb é an cuspóir nó an éifeacht atá léi daoine gan dídean a chur ó dhídean a fháil ó dhéanmhas, talamh nó foirgneamh, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleEn: Planning and Development (Amendment) Bill 2017
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Pleanáil agus Forbairt (Leasú), 2017

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Animal Health and Welfare Act 2013 to prohibit the use of wild animals in circuses; and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Shláinte agus Leas Ainmhithe, 2013, chun úsáid ainmhithe fiáine i sorcais a thoirmeasc; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara

Irish Nationality and Citizenship (Restoration of Birthright Citizenship) Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to restore the eligibility of all persons born in the island of Ireland for Irish citizenship

debates.showAs: Electoral (Extension of Voting Rights to Non-Irish Citizens) Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to extend voting rights in elections to Dáil Éireann and to the European Parliament to all adults ordinarily resident in the State
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh cearta vótála i dtoghcháin do Dháil Éireann agus do Pharlaimint na hEorpa a leathnú chuig na daoine fásta go léir a bhfuil gnáthchónaí orthu sa Stát
bill.shortTitleEn: Electoral (Extension of Voting Rights to Non-Irish Citizens) Bill 2017
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Toghcháin (Cearta Vótála a Leathnú chuig Daoine nach Saoránaigh Éireannacha), 2017

debates.showAs: Anti-Evictions Bill 2016: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Anti-Evictions Bill 2016: Second Stage [Private Members]
Anti-Evictions Bill 2016: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Residential Tenancies Act 2004 to provide for greater security of tenure by making all tenancies over two months Part 4 tenancies, by making Part 4 tenancies of indefinite duration, removing sale of property as a ground for terminating a tenancy, providing for compensation where a tenancy is terminated on the ground that the dwelling is required by the landlord or a relative of the landlord for their own occupation, extension of notice periods for new rents and for the termination of tenancies, and inclusion of receivers and lenders that have taken possession of properties in the definition of a landlord
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe, 2004 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le ráthaíocht tionachta níos mó trí thionóntachtaí faoi Chuid 4 a dhéanamh de gach tionóntacht os cionn dhá mhí, trí thionóntachtaí ré éiginnte a dhéanamh de thionóntachtaí faoi Chuid 4, trí dheireadh a chur le díol maoine mar fhoras le tionóntacht a fhoirceannadh, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cúiteamh i gcás go ndéanfar tionóntacht a fhoirceannadh ar an bhforas go bhfuil an teaghais ag teastáil ón tiarna talún nó ó ghaol leis an tiarna talún lena háitiú acu féin, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le tréimhsí fógra a fhadú i leith cíosanna nua agus i leith tionóntachtaí a fhoirceannadh, agus go n-áireofar glacadóirí agus iasachtóirí a mbeidh seil/bh glactha acu ar mhaoine sa /mhíniú ar thiarna talún
bill.shortTitleEn: Anti-Evictions Bill 2016
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille i gcoinne Díshealbhuithe, 2016

debates.showAs: Equal Participation in Schools Bill 2016: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Equal Participation in Schools Bill 2016: Second Stage [Private Members]
Equal Participation in Schools Bill 2016: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to end religious discrimination in admission to primary and post-primary educational establishments and to provide for full participation of pupils of all faiths and none in primary and post-primary educational establishments
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do chur deireadh le hidirdhealú ar bhonn creidimh i dtaca le daltaí a ligean isteach i mbunachais bhunoideachais agus iarbhunoideachais agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir le rannpháirtíocht iomlán daltaí de gach creideamh agus daltaí gan aon chreideamh i mbunachais bhunoideachais agus iarbhunoideachais
bill.shortTitleEn: Equal Participation in Schools Bill 2016
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Rannpháirtíocht Chomhionann i Scoileanna, 2016

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Constitution
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht chun an Bunreacht a leasú
